widthBreakpointThresholdsPx.description: Window widths on which to separate breakpoints, array of length N

widthBreakpointNames.description: Name of each width breakpoint, array of length N + 1

heightBreakpointThresholdsPx.description: Window heights on which to separate breakpoints, array of length N

heightBreakpointNames.description: Name of each height breakpoint, array of length N + 1

width.description: Current width, NOTE: avoid using in a server callback

height.description: Current height, NOTE: avoid using in a server callback

id.description: Unique ID to identify this component in Dash callbacks.
